description: A STAC API running on stac-server
author: Alireza Jazayeri, Matthew Hanson <matt.a.hanson@gmail.com>, Sean Harkins

scripts.postinstall: cd lambdas/api; npm install; cd ../ingest; npm install; cd ../failed-ingest; npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint-js && echo '> Finished linting ✅'
scripts.lint-fix: npm run lint-js-fix && echo '> Finished lint fixing ✅'
scripts.build: cd lambdas/api; npm run build; cd ../ingest; npm run build; cd ../failed-ingest; npm run build
scripts.build-api-docs: npm run widdershins --search false --language_tabs 'nodejs:NodeJS' 'python:Python' --summary ./packages/api-lib/api-spec.yaml -o ./docs/api.md & npm run shins --inline --logo ./docs/images/logo.png -o ./docs/index.html ./docs/api.md

name: stac-server
